DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety immunogenicity Group B Streptococcus vaccine one dose healthy non pregnant woman three different dos healthy pregnant woman .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Group B Streptococcus Vaccine Non Pregnant Pregnant Women 18-40 Years Age
DOC.criteria: Group 1 ( Non Pregnant Women ) : Healthy female 1840 year age inclusive . Group 2 ( Healthy Pregnant Women ) : Healthy pregnant woman 1840 yrs age ( 2835 week gestation ) Group 1 ( Non Pregnant Women ) : Pregnant nursing ; History severe allergy previous vaccine ; Known HIV positive Group 2 ( Healthy Pregnant Women ) : History severe allergy previous vaccine ; Known HIV positive
